column1: Tarmenel was a term that clearly translates as "high heaven"
column2: though as it only appears in one of Bilbo Bagginss rhymes
column3: it is hard to be sure exactly what the term referred to. In Elves cosmology
column4: the world was enfolded in different layers of airs
column5: and it seems that Tarmenel was a term for the highest or outermost of these - the "Over-heaven".
